00084     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00085     // Multipole Interaction Class //
00086     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00087 
00088     class Interactor
00089     {
00090     public:
00091 
00092         Interactor(Topology *top, EMultipole *em) : _top(top), _em(em) {};
00093         Interactor() : _top(NULL), _em(NULL) {};
00094        ~Interactor() {};
00095                
00096         // UNITS IN INPUT FILES
00097         // ... Always use atomic units
00098         // ... ... Positions in a0 (bohr)
00099         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(a0)**k
00100         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in A³ (Angstrom cubed)
00101        
00102         // UNITS USED INTERNALLY
00103         // ... Use nm instead of a0 and A
00104         // ... ... Positions in nm
00105         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(nm)**k
00106         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in nm³
00107 
00108         // CONVERSION FACTORS
00109         // ... Electric field (N/C) = Electric field (int)
00110         //                          * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+18
00111         // ... Energy (eV) = Energy (int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+09
00112         //
00113         // ... Potential (V) = Potential(int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+0.9
00114 
00115 
00116         inline double EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00117         inline double EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00118         inline double EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00119         inline void FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00120         inline vec  FieldPermESF(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00121         inline void FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00122         inline void FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00123 
00124         inline double PotentialPerm(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00125         
00126         void ResetEnergy() { EP = EU_INTER = EU_INTRA = 0.0; }
00127         double &getEP() { return EP; }
00128         double &getEU_INTER() { return EU_INTER; }
00129         double &getEU_INTRA() { return EU_INTRA; }
00130 
00131     private:
00132 
00133         double EP;       //   <- Interaction permanent multipoles (inter-site)
00134         double EU_INTRA; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (intra-site)
00135         double EU_INTER; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (inter-site)
00136 
00137 
00138         vec    e12;     //  |
00139         double u3;      //  |-> NOTE: Only needed when using Thole model
00140         double a;       //  |         (do not forget to init. though...)
00141 
00142         double R;       //  |
00143         double R2;      //  |
00144         double R3;      //  |-> NOTE: reciprocal, i.e. e.g. R3 = 1/(R*R*R)
00145         double R4;      //  |
00146         double R5;      //  |
00147 
00148         double rax, ray, raz;
00149         double rbx, rby, rbz;
00150         double cxx, cxy, cxz;
00151         double cyx, cyy, cyz;
00152         double czx, czy, czz;
00153 
00154         inline double lambda3() { return 1 - exp( -a*u3); }
00155         inline double lambda5() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00156         inline double lambda7() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + 0.6*a*a*u3*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00157         inline double lambda9() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + (18*a*a*u3*u3 + 9*a*a*a*u3*u3*u3)/35) * exp( -a*u3); }
00158 
00159         inline double T00_00() { return R; }
00160 
00161         inline double T1x_00() { return R2 * rax; }
00162         inline double T1y_00() { return R2 * ray; }
00163         inline double T1z_00() { return R2 * raz; }
00164         inline double T00_1x() { return R2 * rbx; }
00165         inline double T00_1y() { return R2 * rby; }
00166         inline double T00_1z() { return R2 * rbz; }
00167 
00168         inline double TU1x_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * rax; }
00169         inline double TU1y_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * ray; }
00170         inline double TU1z_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * raz; }
00171         inline double TU00_1x() { return lambda3() * R2 * rbx; }
00172         inline double TU00_1y() { return lambda3() * R2 * rby; }
00173         inline double TU00_1z() { return lambda3() * R2 * rbz; }
00174 
00175         inline double T20_00()  { return R3 * 0.5 * (3 * raz*raz - 1); }
00176         inline double T21c_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rax * raz; }
00177         inline double T21s_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * ray * raz; }
00178         inline double T22c_00() { return R3 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (rax*rax - ray*ray); }
00179         inline double T22s_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rax*ray; }
00180         inline double T00_20()  { return R3 * 0.5 * (3 * rbz*rbz - 1); }
00181         inline double T00_21c() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rbx * rbz; }
00182         inline double T00_21s() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rby * rbz; }
00183         inline double T00_22c() { return R3 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (rbx*rbx - rby*rby); }
00184         inline double T00_22s() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rbx*rby; }
00185 
00186         inline double T1x_1x() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rbx + cxx); }
00187         inline double T1x_1y() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rby + cxy); }
00188         inline double T1x_1z() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rbz + cxz); }
00189         inline double T1y_1x() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rbx + cyx); }
00190         inline double T1y_1y() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rby + cyy); }
00191         inline double T1y_1z() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rbz + cyz); }
00192         inline double T1z_1x() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rbx + czx); }
00193         inline double T1z_1y() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rby + czy); }
00194         inline double T1z_1z() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rbz + czz); }
00195 
00196         inline double TU1x_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rbx + lambda3()*cxx); }
00197         inline double TU1x_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rby + lambda3()*cxy); }
00198         inline double TU1x_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rbz + lambda3()*cxz); }
00199         inline double TU1y_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rbx + lambda3()*cyx); }
00200         inline double TU1y_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rby + lambda3()*cyy); }
00201         inline double TU1y_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rbz + lambda3()*cyz); }
00202         inline double TU1z_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rbx + lambda3()*czx); }
00203         inline double TU1z_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rby + lambda3()*czy); }
00204         inline double TU1z_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rbz + lambda3()*czz); }
00205 
00206         inline double T20_1x()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rbx + 6*raz*czx - 3*rbx); }
00207         inline double T20_1y()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rby + 6*raz*czy - 3*rby); }
00208         inline double T20_1z()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rbz + 6*raz*czz - 3*rbz); }
00209         inline double T21c_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czx + cxx*raz + 5*rax*raz*rbx); }
00210         inline double T21c_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czy + cxy*raz + 5*rax*raz*rby); }
00211         inline double T21c_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czz + cxz*raz + 5*rax*raz*rbz); }
00212         inline double T21s_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czx + cyx*raz + 5*ray*raz*rbx); }
00213         inline double T21s_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czy + cyy*raz + 5*ray*raz*rby); }
00214         inline double T21s_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czz + cyz*raz + 5*ray*raz*rbz); }
00215         inline double T22c_1x() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rbx + 2*rax*cxx - 2*ray*cyx); }
00216         inline double T22c_1y() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rby + 2*rax*cxy - 2*ray*cyy); }
00217         inline double T22c_1z() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rbz + 2*rax*cxz - 2*ray*cyz); }
00218         inline double T22s_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rbx + rax*cyx + ray*cxx ); }
00219         inline double T22s_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rby + rax*cyy + ray*cxy ); }
00220         inline double T22s_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rbz + rax*cyz + ray*cxz ); }

00222         inline double T1x_20()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*rbz*rbz*rax + 6*rbz*cxz - 3*rax); }

00282         inline double T22c_22c() { return R5 * 0.25 * (35*rax*rax*rbx*rbx - 35*rax*rax*rby*rby - 35*ray*ray*rbx*rbx + 35*ray*ray*rby*rby + 20*rax*rbx*cxx - 20*rax*rby*cxy - 20*ray*rbx*cyx + 20*ray*rby*cyy + 2*cxx*cxx - 2*cxy*cxy - 2*cyx*cyx + 2*cyy*cyy); }
00283         inline double T22c_22s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rax*rax*rbx*rby - 35*ray*ray*rbx*rby + 10*rax*rbx*cxy + 10*rax*rby*cxx - 10*ray*rbx*cyy - 10*ray*rby*cyx + 2*cxx*cxy - 2*cyx*cyy); }
00284         inline double T22s_22s() { return R5 * (35*rax*ray*rbx*rby + 5*rax*rbx*cyy + 5*rax*rby*cyx + 5*ray*rbx*cxy + 5*ray*rby*cxx + cxx*cyy + cxy*cyx); }
00285 
00286         inline double T21c_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*raz - 5*rax*raz + 10*rbz*rax*czz + 10*rbz*raz*cxz + 2*cxz*czz); }
00287         inline double T21s_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*ray*raz - 5*ray*raz + 10*rbz*ray*czz + 10*rbz*raz*cyz + 2*cyz*czz); }
00288         inline double T22c_20()  { return R5 * 0.25 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbz*rbz*ray*ray - 5*rax*rax + 5*ray*ray + 20*rbz*rax*cxz - 20*rbz*ray*cyz + 2*cxz*cxz - 2*cyz*cyz); }
00289         inline double T22s_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*ray - 5*rax*ray + 10*rbz*rax*cyz + 10*rbz*ray*cxz + 2*cxz*cyz); }
00290         inline double T21s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*ray*raz + 5*rbx*ray*czz + 5*rbx*raz*cyz + 5*rbz*ray*czx + 5*rbz*raz*cyx + cyx*czz + czx*cyz); }
00291         inline double T22c_21c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbx*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cxz - 10*rbx*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxx - 10*rbz*ray*cyx + 2*cxx*cxz - 2*cyx*cyz); }
00292         inline double T22s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rbx*rax*cyz + 5*rbx*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyx + 5*rbz*ray*cxx + cxx*cyz + cyx*cxz); }
00293         inline double T22c_21s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rby*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rby*rax*cxz - 10*rby*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxy - 10*rbz*ray*cyy + 2*cxy*cxz - 2*cyy*cyz); }
00294         inline double T22s_21s() { return R5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rby*rax*cyz + 5*rby*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyy + 5*rbz*ray*cxy + cxy*cyz + cyy*cxz); }
00295         inline double T22s_22c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbx*rax*ray - 35*rby*rby*rax*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cyx + 10*rbx*ray*cxx - 10*rby*rax*cyy - 10*rby*ray*cxy + 2*cxx*cyx - 2*cxy*cyy); }
00296 
00297         Topology        *_top;
00298         EMultipole     *_em;
00299 
00300     };
00301 
00302 
00303     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00304     // Site workers (i.e. individual threads) //
00305     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00306 
00307     class SiteOpMultipole : public Thread
00308     {
00309     public:
00310 
00311         SiteOpMultipole(int id, Topology *top,
00312                      EMultipole *master)
00313                    : _id(id), _top(top), _seg(NULL),
00314                      _master(master)     
00315                    { _actor = Interactor(top,_master); };
00316 
00317        ~SiteOpMultipole();
00318 
00319         int  getId() { return _id; }
00320         void setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00321 
00322         void InitSlotData(Topology *top);
00323         void Run(void);
00324 
00325         void   EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg);
00326         void   Charge(int state);
00327         int    Induce(int state);
00328         double Energy(int state);
00329         void   Depolarize();
00330 
00331 
00332     public:
00333 
00334         int                           _id;
00335         Topology                     *_top;
00336         Segment                      *_seg;
00337         EMultipole                  *_master;
00338 
00339         vector< Segment* >           _segsPolSphere; // Segments within cutoff
00340         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsPolSphere; // Polar sites within c/o
00341         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites;    // Copy of top polar sites
00342         Interactor                   _actor;
00343     };
00344 
00345 
00346 private:
00347 
00348     // Allocation of polar sites to fragments and segments
00349     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     _map_seg_polarSites;
00350     map<string, vector<bool> >           _map_seg_chrgStates;
00351     map<string, vector<int> >            _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00352     map<string, vector<string> >         _alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00353     map<string, bool>                    _map2md;
00354 
00355     // Thread management
00356     vector<Segment*> ::iterator _nextSite;
00357     Mutex                       _nextSiteMutex;
00358     Mutex                       _coutMutex;
00359     Mutex                       _logMutex;
00360     bool                        _maverick;
00361 
00362     // Control options
00363     bool            _induce;
00364     int             _firstSeg;
00365     int             _lastSeg;
00366     string          _checkPolesPDB;
00367 
00368     // ESP
00369     bool            _calcESP;
00370     bool            _ESPdoSystem;
00371     string          _espCubeFile;
00372     string          _espOutFile;
00373     vector<vec>     _cube;
00374 
00375     // ESF
00376     bool            _calcESF;
00377     string          _esfGridFile;
00378     string          _esfOutFile;
00379     vector<vec>     _esfGrid;
00380 
00381     // MolPol
00382     bool            _calcAlphaMol;
00383     bool            _doSystem;
00384     string          _alphaOutFile;
00385 
00386     // Logging
00387     string          _outFile;
00388     bool            _energies2File;
00389     map<int,vector<int> > _log_seg_iter;
00390     map<int,int>    _log_seg_sphereSize;
00391     map<int,vec>    _log_seg_com;
00392 
00393     // Interaction parameters
00394     bool            _useCutoff;
00395     double          _cutoff;
00396     bool            _useExp;
00397     double          _aDamp;
00398     bool            _useScaling;
00399     vector<double>  _scale1;
00400 
00401     // Convergence parameters
00402     float           _wSOR_N;
00403     float           _wSOR_C;
00404     double          _epsTol;
00405     int             _maxIter;
00406 
00407 };
00408 
00409 
00416 void EMultipole::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00417 
00418     cout << endl << "... ... Initialize with " << _nThreads << " threads.";
00419     _maverick = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
00420 
00421     cout << endl <<  "... ... Parametrizing Thole model";
00422 
00423     string key;
00424     string xmlfile;
00425 
00426     /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure ----
00427      * <emultipole>
00428      *
00429      *      <multipoles></multipoles>
00430      *
00431      *      <control>
00432      *          <induce></induce>
00433      *          <first></first>
00434      *          <last></last>
00435      *          <output></output>
00436      *          <check></check>
00437      *      </control>
00438      *
00439      *      <esp>
00440      *          <calcESP></calcESP>
00441      *          <doSystem></doSystem>
00442      *          <cube></cube>
00443      *          <output></output>
00444      *      <esp>
00445      *
00446      *      <esf>
00447      *          <calcESF></calcESF>
00448      *          <grid></grid>
00449      *          <output></output>
00450      *      <esf>
00451      *
00452      *      <alphamol>
00453      *          <calcAlpha></calcAlpha>
00454      *          <doSystem></doSystem>
00455      *          <output></output>
00456      *      </alphamol>
00457      *
00458      *      <tholeparam>
00459      *          <cutoff></cutoff>
00460      *          <expdamp></expdamp>
00461      *          <scaling></scaling>
00462      *      </tholeparam>
00463      *
00464      *      <convparam>
00465      *          <wSOR_N></wSOR_N>
00466      *          <wSOR_C></wSOR_C>
00467      *          <maxiter></maxiter>
00468      *          <tolerance></tolerance>
00469      *          <log></log>
00470      *      </convparam>
00471      */
00472 
00473     key = "options.emultipole.multipoles";
00474 
00475         if ( opt->exists(key) ) {
00476             xmlfile = opt->get(key).as< string >();
00477         }
00478 
00479     key = "options.emultipole.control";
00480 
00481         if ( opt->exists(key+".induce") ) {
00482             int induce = opt->get(key+".induce").as< int >();
00483             _induce = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
00484         }
00485         else { _induce = true; }
00486 
00487         if ( opt->exists(key+".first") ) {
00488             _firstSeg = opt->get(key+".first").as< int >();
00489         }
00490         else { _firstSeg = 1; }
00491 
00492         if ( opt->exists(key+".last") ) {
00493             _lastSeg = opt->get(key+".last").as< int >();
00494         }
00495         else { _lastSeg = -1; }
00496 
00497         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00498             _outFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00499             _energies2File = true;
00500         }
00501         else { _energies2File = false; }
00502 
00503         if ( opt->exists(key+".check") ) {
00504             _checkPolesPDB = opt->get(key+".check").as< string >();
00505         }
00506         else { _checkPolesPDB = ""; }
00507 
00508     key = "options.emultipole.esp";
00509 
00510         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESP") ) {
00511             int calcESP = opt->get(key+".calcESP").as< int >();
00512             _calcESP = (calcESP == 0) ? false : true;
00513         }
00514         else {
00515             _calcESP = false;
00516         }
00517         if (_calcESP) {
00518             _espCubeFile = opt->get(key+".cube").as< string >();
00519             _espOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00520             if (opt->exists(key+".doSystem")) {
00521                 int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
00522                 _ESPdoSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
00523             }
00524             else { _ESPdoSystem = false; }
00525         }
00526 
00527     key = "options.emultipole.esf";
00528 
00529         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESF") ) {
00530             int calcESF = opt->get(key+".calcESF").as< int >();
00531             _calcESF = (calcESF == 0) ? false : true;
00532         }
00533         else {
00534             _calcESF = false;
00535         }
00536         if (_calcESF) {
00537             _esfGridFile = opt->get(key+".grid").as< string >();
00538             _esfOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00539         }
00540 
00541     key = "options.emultipole.alphamol";
00542 
00543         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcAlpha") ) {
00544             int calcAlpha = opt->get(key+".calcAlpha").as< int >();
00545             _calcAlphaMol = (calcAlpha == 0) ? false : true;
00546         }
00547         if ( opt->exists(key+".doSystem") ) {
00548             int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
00549             _doSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
00550         }
00551         else {
00552             _doSystem = false;
00553         }
00554         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00555             string alphaOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00556             _alphaOutFile = alphaOutFile;
00557         }
00558         else {
00559             _alphaOutFile = "nofile";
00560         }
00561 
00562     key = "options.emultipole.tholeparam";
00563 
00564         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff") ) {
00565             _cutoff = opt->get(key+".cutoff").as< double >();
00566             if (_cutoff) { _useCutoff = true; }
00567         }
00568         if ( opt->exists(key+".expdamp") ) {
00569             _aDamp = opt->get(key+".expdamp").as< double >();
00570             if (_aDamp) { _useExp = true; }
00571         }
00572          if ( opt->exists(key+".scaling") ) {
00573             _scale1 = opt->get(key+".scaling").as< vector<double> >();
00574             if (0 < _scale1.size() && _scale1.size() < 4) {
00575                 _useScaling = true; }
00576             else {
00577                 _useScaling = false;
00578                 cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: 1-N SCALING SWITCHED OFF"; }
00579         }
00580 
00581     key = "options.emultipole.convparam";
00582 
00583         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_N") ) {
00584             _wSOR_N = opt->get(key+".wSOR_N").as< float >();
00585         }
00586         else { _wSOR_N = 0.75; }
00587         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_C") ) {
00588             _wSOR_C = opt->get(key+".wSOR_C").as< float >();
00589         }
00590         else { _wSOR_C = 0.75; }
00591 
00592         if ( opt->exists(key+".maxiter") ) {
00593             _maxIter = opt->get(key+".maxiter").as< int >();
00594         }
00595         else { _maxIter = 512; }
00596 
00597         if ( opt->exists(key+".tolerance") ) {
00598             _epsTol = opt->get(key+".tolerance").as< double >();
00599         }
00600         else { _epsTol = 0.001; }
00601 
00602     if (!top->isEStatified()) { this->EStatify(top, opt); }
00603 
00604     if (_calcESP && (!_ESPdoSystem))      { this->CalculateESPInput(top); }
00605     if (this->_calcESF)                   { this->CalculateESF(top); }
00606     if (this->_calcAlphaMol)              { this->CalculateAlphaInput(top); }
00607 }
00608 
00609 
00616 void EMultipole::EStatify(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00617 
00618     cout << endl << "... ... Estatify system: ";
00619 
00620     string key = "options.emultipole";
00621     string allocFile = options->get(key+".multipoles").as<string> ();
00622 
00623     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00624     // Load polar-site indices from XML //
00625     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00626 
00627     // => Output to maps:
00628     map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00629     map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00630     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n;
00631     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e;
00632     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h;
00633 
00634     Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
00635     load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
00636 
00637 
00638     /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
00639      *
00640      * <topology>
00641      *
00642      *     <molecules>
00643      *          <molecule>
00644      *          <name></name>
00645      *
00646      *          <segments>
00647      *
00648      *              <segment>
00649      *              <name>DCV</name>
00650      *
00651      *              <multipoles_n></multipoles_n>
00652      *              <multipoles_e></multipoles_e>
00653      *              <multipoles_h></multipoles_h>
00654      *
00655      *              <map2md></map2md>
00656      *
00657      *              <fragments>
00658      *                  <fragment>
00659      *                  <name></name>
00660      *                  <mpoles></mpoles>
00661      *                  </fragment>
00662      *              </fragments>
00663      *              ...
00664      *              ...
00665      */
00666 
00667 
00668     key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00669     list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
00670     list<Property *>::iterator molit;
00671     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
00672 
00673         string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00674 
00675         key = "segments.segment";
00676         list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00677         list<Property *>::iterator segit;
00678 
00679         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
00680 
00681             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00682 
00683             // GDMA filenames for cation (h), neutral (n), anion (e) state
00684             string mpoleFile_n = (*segit)->get("multipoles_n").as<string> ();
00685             alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n[segName] = mpoleFile_n;
00686             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_e")) {
00687                 string mpoleFile_e = (*segit)->get("multipoles_e").as<string>();
00688                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e[segName] = mpoleFile_e;
00689             }
00690             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_h")) {
00691                 string mpoleFile_h = (*segit)->get("multipoles_h").as<string>();
00692                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h[segName] = mpoleFile_h;
00693             }
00694 
00695             // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
00696             if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
00697                 int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
00698                 _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
00699             }
00700             else {
00701                 _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
00702             }
00703 
00704             key = "fragments.fragment";
00705             list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
00706             list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
00707 
00708             for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
00709 
00710                 string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00711                 string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
00712 
00713                 string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
00714 
00715                 Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
00716                 vector<string> mpoleInfo;
00717                 tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
00718 
00719                 vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
00720                 vector<string> mpoleNames;
00721 
00722                 vector<string> ::iterator strit;
00723                 for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
00724                     
00725                     Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
00726                     vector<string> poleInfo;
00727                     tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
00728 
00729                     int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
00730                     string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
00731 
00732                     mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
00733                     mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
00734                     
00735                 }
00736 
00737                 alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
00738                 alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
00739             }
00740         }
00741     }
00742 
00743     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00744     // Parse GDMA punch files //
00745     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00746 
00747     // => Output to PolarSite Container (template container)
00748     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > map_seg_polarSites;
00749     map<string, vector<bool> >       map_seg_chrgStates;
00750 
00751 
00752     // Multipoles for neutral state
00753     int state = 0; 
00754     map<string, string > ::iterator strit;
00755     for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.begin();
00756          strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.end();
00757          strit++) {
00758 
00759         string segName = strit->first;
00760         string filename = strit->second;
00761 
00762         vector< PolarSite* > poles = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00763 
00764         map_seg_polarSites[segName] = poles;
00765         map_seg_chrgStates[segName].resize(3);
00766         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][0] = false; // <- negative
00767         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][1] = true;  // <- neutral
00768         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][2] = false; // <- positive
00769         poles.clear();
00770 
00771     }
00772 
00773     // Multipoles for negative state
00774     state = -1;
00775     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.size() ) {
00776         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.begin();
00777              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.end();
00778              strit++) {
00779             string segName = strit->first;
00780             string filename = strit->second;
00781 
00782             vector< PolarSite* > polesAnion = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00783             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00784 
00785             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00786             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];            
00787 
00788             assert(polesAnion.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00789             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00790 
00791                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesAnion[i]->getQs(state), state );
00792                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesAnion[i]->getPs(state), state );
00793                 delete polesAnion[i];
00794             }
00795             polesAnion.clear();
00796         }
00797     }
00798 
00799     // Multipoles for positive state
00800     state = +1;
00801     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.size() ) {
00802         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.begin();
00803              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.end();
00804              strit++) {
00805             string segName = strit->first;
00806             string filename = strit->second;
00807 
00808             vector< PolarSite* > polesCation = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00809             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00810 
00811             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00812             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];            
00813 
00814             assert(polesCation.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00815             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00816 
00817                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesCation[i]->getQs(state), state );
00818                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesCation[i]->getPs(state), state );
00819                 delete polesCation[i];
00820             }
00821             polesCation.clear();
00822         }
00823     }
00824 
00825     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00826     // Forward information on polar-site templates to topology //
00827     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00828 
00829     // Containers to use for mapping
00830     // map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     map_seg_polarSites;
00831     // map<string, vector<int> >            alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00832     // map<string, vector<string> >         alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00833     
00834     // TO CONTINUE FROM HERE ...
00835     // Loop over segments, loop over fragments in segments.
00836     // => For each segment, look up associated polar sites using map 1;
00837     //      => For each fragment, look up associated
00838     //         polar sites idcs. using map 2;
00839     //          => For each index in retrieved container, create new polar site,
00840     //             importing information from polar site container of segment
00841     //          => Translate positions to MD frame, copy local frame from
00842     //             fragment
00843 
00844     _map_seg_polarSites = map_seg_polarSites;
00845     _map_seg_chrgStates = map_seg_chrgStates;
00846     _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx =  alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00847     _alloc_frag_mpoleName = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00848     
00849 }
00850 
00851 
00859 vector<PolarSite*> EMultipole::ParseGdmaFile(string filename, int state) {
00860 
00861     int poleCount = 1;
00862     double Q0_total = 0.0;
00863     string units = "";
00864     bool useDefaultPs = true;
00865 
00866     vector<PolarSite*> poles;
00867     PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
00868 
00869     vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
00870     double         P1; // <- dipole polarizability
00871 
00872     std::string line;
00873     std::ifstream intt;
00874     intt.open(filename.c_str());
00875 
00876     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00877         while ( intt.good() ) {
00878 
00879             std::getline(intt, line);
00880             vector<string> split;
00881             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
00882             toker.ToVector(split);
00883 
00884             if ( !split.size()      ||
00885                   split[0] == "!"   ||
00886                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
00887 
00888     // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
00889     // ! DCV2T opt
00890     // ! SP        RB3LYP          6-311+G(d,p)
00891     // Units bohr
00892     //
00893     // C          -4.2414603400   -3.8124751600    0.0017575736    Rank  2
00894     //  -0.3853409355
00895     //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
00896     //  -0.7220625314   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545   0.4526409813  -0.50937399
00897     //  P 1.75
00898 
00899 
00900             // Units used
00901             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
00902                 units = split[1];
00903                 if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
00904                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00905                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00906                 }
00907             }
00908 
00909             // element,  position,  rank limit
00910             else if ( split.size() == 6 ) {
00911 
00912                 Qs.clear();
00913                 P1 = -1.;
00914 
00915                 int id = poleCount++;  // <- starts from 1
00916                 string name = split[0];
00917 
00918                 double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00919                 double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
00920                 double x, y, z;
00921 
00922                 if (units == "bohr") {
00923                     x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00924                     y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00925                     z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00926                 }
00927                 else if (units == "angstrom") {
00928                     x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00929                     y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00930                     z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00931                 }
00932                 else {
00933                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00934                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00935                 }
00936                 
00937                 vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
00938 
00939                 int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
00940 
00941                 PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
00942                 newPole->setRank(rank);
00943                 newPole->setPos(pos);
00944                 poles.push_back(newPole);
00945                 thisPole = newPole;
00946 
00947             }
00948 
00949             // 'P', dipole polarizability
00950             else if ( split[0] == "P" && split.size() == 2 ) {
00951                 P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00952                 thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
00953                 useDefaultPs = false;
00954             }
00955 
00956             // multipole line
00957             else {
00958 
00959                 int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
00960 
00961                 if (lineRank == 0) {
00962                     Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
00963                 }
00964 
00965                 for (int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
00966 
00967                     double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
00968 
00969                     // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
00970                     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00971                     qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
00972 
00973                     Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
00974 
00975                 }
00976                 thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
00977             }
00978 
00979         } /* Exit loop over lines */
00980     }
00981     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
00982 
00983     cout << endl << "... ... ... Reading " << filename <<
00984                     ": Q0(Total) = " << Q0_total << flush;
00985 
00986     if (useDefaultPs) {
00987 
00988         cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
00989              << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
00990 
00991         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
00992         for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
00993             string elem = (*pol)->getName();
00994             double alpha = 0.0;
00995             // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
00996             if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3;  } // <- conversion from
00997             else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
00998             else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
00999             else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
01000             else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
01001             // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
01002             //if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
01003             //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
01004             //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
01005             //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
01006             //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
01007             else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
01008                                        "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
01009             (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
01010         }
01011     }
01012 
01013     return poles;
01014     
01015 }
01016 
01017 
01022 vector<vec> EMultipole::ParseCubeFileHeader(string filename) {
01023 
01024     vector< vec > cube;
01025     cube.resize(5);
01026 
01027     //               STRUCTURE CUBE CONTAINER
01028     //       0        1         2         3         4
01029     //  |         |         |         |         |         |
01030     //   ox oy oz  Nx Ny Nz  xx xy xz  yx yy yz  zx zy zz
01031 
01032     std::string line;
01033     int lineCount = 0;
01034 
01035     double Nx = 0;
01036     double Ny = 0;
01037     double Nz = 0;
01038     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
01039     double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
01040     double ext2nm = BOHR2NM;
01041 
01042     std::ifstream intt;
01043     intt.open(filename.c_str());
01044 
01045     if (intt.is_open()) {
01046         while (intt.good()) {
01047 
01048             ++lineCount;
01049 
01050             std::getline(intt, line);
01051             vector<string> split;
01052             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
01053             toker.ToVector(split);
01054 
01055             // First two lines are comment lines
01056             if (lineCount == 1 || lineCount == 2) { continue; }            
01057 
01058 
01059 
01060             // Skip empty lines
01061             if ( split.size() == 0) { continue; }
01062 
01063             // => Interesting information here
01064             if (lineCount == 3) {
01065 
01066                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01067                 double ox = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01068                 double oy = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01069                 double oz = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01070 
01071                 cube[0] = vec(ox, oy, oz);
01072             }
01073 
01074             /*
01075             STRUCTURE SAMPLE CPMD CUBE FILE
01076             OUTER LOOP: X, MIDDLE LOOP: Y, INNER LOOP: Z
01077               3    0.000000    0.000000    0.000000
01078              40    0.283459    0.000000    0.000000
01079              40    0.000000    0.283459    0.000000
01080              40    0.000000    0.000000    0.283459
01081               8    0.000000    5.570575    5.669178    5.593517
01082               1    0.000000    5.562867    5.669178    7.428055
01083               1    0.000000    7.340606    5.669178    5.111259
01084               :             :          :           :            :            :
01085               :             :          :           :            :            :
01086               :             :          :           :            :            :
01087                 In this case there will be 40 x 40 x 40 floating point values
01088               :             :          :           :            :            :
01089               :             :          :           :            :            :
01090               :             :          :           :            :            :
01091             */
01092 
01093             if (lineCount == 4) {
01094 
01095                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01096                 Nx = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
01097                 ext2nm = (Nx > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
01098                 Nx = (Nx >= 0) ? Nx : -Nx;
01099                 double xx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01100                 double xy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01101                 double xz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01102 
01103                 cube[2] = vec(xx, xy, xz);                
01104             }
01105 
01106             if (lineCount == 5) {
01107 
01108                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01109                 Ny = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
01110                 ext2nm = (Ny > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
01111                 Ny = (Ny >= 0) ? Ny : -Ny;
01112                 double yx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01113                 double yy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01114                 double yz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01115 
01116                 cube[3] = vec(yx, yy, yz);
01117             }
01118 
01119             if (lineCount == 6) {
01120 
01121                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01122                 Nz = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
01123                 ext2nm = (Nz > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
01124                 Nz = (Nz >= 0) ? Nz : -Nz;
01125                 double zx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01126                 double zy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01127                 double zz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01128 
01129                 cube[4] = vec(zx, zy, zz);
01130                 cube[1] = vec(Nx, Ny, Nz);
01131             }
01132 
01133             // Header at finish?
01134             if (lineCount > 6) {
01135                 break;
01136             }
01137         }
01138     }
01139     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
01140 
01141     // Convert origin
01142     cube[0] *= ext2nm;
01143 
01144     return cube;
01145 }
01146 
01147 
01153 void EMultipole::CalculateESPInput(Topology *top) {
01154 
01155     cout << endl << "... ... Calculating ESP";
01156 
01157     // Load grid from cube file
01158     _cube = ParseCubeFileHeader(_espCubeFile);
01159 
01160     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01161     // Iterate over segment types (in GDMA config) //
01162     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01163     
01164     map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
01165     for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
01166          sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
01167          ++sit) {
01168 
01169         cout << endl << "... ... ... ESP for segment type " << sit->first
01170              << flush;
01171 
01172         vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
01173         vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
01174 
01175         // Translate CoM to origin
01176         vec CoM = vec(0.,0.,0.);
01177         int N = poles.size();
01178         for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01179             CoM += (*pit)->getPos();
01180         }
01181         CoM /= N;
01182         for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01183             vec newpos = (*pit)->getPos() - CoM;
01184             (*pit)->setPos( newpos );
01185         }
01186 
01187         for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
01188 
01189             // Multipole data for this state?
01190             bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
01191             if (!hasState) { continue; }
01192 
01193             // Charge container appropriately
01194             for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01195                 (*pit)->Depolarize();
01196                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01197             }
01198 
01199             // Prepare cube file, for structure sample see cube-file parser
01200             FILE *out;
01201             string espOutFile =  sit->first
01202                             + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
01203                             + "_" + _espOutFile;
01204             out = fopen(espOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01205 
01206             fprintf(out, "CUBE FILE GENERATED BY VOTCA CTP \n");
01207             fprintf(out, "ESP %4s CHARGE %1d \n", (sit->first).c_str(), state);
01208 
01209             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... State " << state << ": " << flush;
01210 
01211             this->CalculateESP(poles, out);
01212 
01213             fclose(out);
01214         }
01215     }
01216 }
01217 
01218 
01224 void EMultipole::CalculateESPRigid(Topology *top) {
01225 
01226     cout << endl << "... ... Calculate ESP for segment ID: " << flush;
01227 
01228     // Cube volumetric grid
01229     _cube = ParseCubeFileHeader(_espCubeFile);
01230 
01231     int segId;
01232     cin >> segId;
01233 
01234     Segment *seg = top->getSegment(segId);
01235 
01236     cout << "... ... ... Selected segment type " << seg->getName() << flush;
01237 
01238     vector< PolarSite* > poles = seg->PolarSites();
01239     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01240 
01241     // Translate CoM to origin
01242     vec CoM = vec(0.,0.,0.);
01243     int N = poles.size();
01244     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01245         CoM += (*pit)->getPos();
01246     }
01247     CoM /= N;
01248     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01249         vec newpos = (*pit)->getPos() - CoM;
01250         (*pit)->setPos( newpos );
01251     }
01252     
01253     // Investigate charge states
01254     for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
01255         bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()][state+1];
01256         if (!hasState) { continue; }
01257 
01258         for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01259             (*pit)->Charge(state);
01260         }
01261 
01262         FILE *out;
01263         string espOutFile = seg->getName()
01264                         + "_ID" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(seg->getId())
01265                         + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
01266                         + "_" + _espOutFile;
01267         out = fopen(espOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01268 
01269         fprintf(out, "CUBE FILE GENERATED BY VOTCA CTP \n");
01270         fprintf(out, "ESP %4s ID %4d CHARGE %1d \n", 
01271                       seg->getName().c_str(), seg->getId(), state);
01272 
01273         cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state << ": " << flush;
01274 
01275         this->CalculateESP(poles, out);
01276 
01277         fclose(out);
01278     }
01279 }
01280 
01281 
01287 void EMultipole::CalculateESP(vector< PolarSite* > &poles, FILE *out) {
01288 
01289     // Calculate potential for each voxel, write to output on the fly
01290     Interactor actor = Interactor(NULL, this);
01291     vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
01292 
01293     vec Cxyz = _cube[0];
01294 
01295     vec C0 = _cube[0];
01296     vec Cx = _cube[2];
01297     vec Cy = _cube[3];
01298     vec Cz = _cube[4];
01299 
01300     int Nx = int(_cube[1].getX() + 0.5);
01301     int Ny = int(_cube[1].getY() + 0.5);
01302     int Nz = int(_cube[1].getZ() + 0.5);
01303 
01304 
01305     // Prepare cube file: Header
01306     double NM2BOHR = 1 / 0.0529189379;
01307     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01308                   poles.size(),
01309                   Cxyz.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01310                   Cxyz.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01311                   Cxyz.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01312     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01313                   Nx,
01314                   Cx.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01315                   Cx.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01316                   Cx.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01317     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01318                   Ny,
01319                   Cy.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01320                   Cy.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01321                   Cy.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01322     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01323                   Nz,
01324                   Cz.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01325                   Cz.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01326                   Cz.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01327     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01328 
01329         string elem = (*pit)->_name;
01330         int Z = 0;
01331         if      (elem == "C") { Z = 6; }
01332         else if (elem == "H") { Z = 1; }
01333         else if (elem == "N") { Z = 7; }
01334         else if (elem == "O") { Z = 8; }
01335         else if (elem == "S") { Z = 16; }
01336 
01337         fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01338                 Z,
01339                 0.000,
01340                 (*pit)->getPos().getX() * NM2BOHR,
01341                 (*pit)->getPos().getY() * NM2BOHR,
01342                 (*pit)->getPos().getZ() * NM2BOHR);
01343     }
01344 
01345     int phiCount = 0;
01346     double int2V = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
01347 
01348     for (int i = 0; i < Nx; ++i) {
01349         for (int j = 0; j < Ny; ++j) {
01350             for ( int k = 0; k < Nz; ++k) {
01351 
01352                 Cxyz = C0 + i*Cx + j*Cy + k*Cz;
01353 
01354                 double phi = 0.0;
01355                 ++phiCount;
01356 
01357                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01358                     phi += actor.PotentialPerm(Cxyz, *(*pit));
01359                 }
01360 
01361                 fprintf(out, " %1.7E", phi * int2V);
01362                 if ( (phiCount % 6) == 0 ) {
01363                     fprintf(out, " \n");
01364                     phiCount = 0;
01365                 }
01366             }
01367         }
01368     }
01369     
01370     cout << " Calculated potential at " << Nx*Ny*Nz
01371          << " grid points. " << flush;
01372 
01373     // Calculate self-energy of configuration (just out of interest)
01374     double E = 0.0;
01375     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
01376     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01377         for (pit2 = pit + 1; pit2 < poles.end(); ++pit2) {
01378             E += actor.EnergyInterESP(*(*pit), *(*pit2));            
01379         }
01380     }
01381     double E2eV = 1.602176487e-19 * 1e9 * 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12);
01382     cout << endl << "... ... ... ... "
01383          << "Electrostatic self-energy of configuration: "
01384          << E*E2eV << " eV. ";
01385     
01386 }
01387 
01388 
01394 void EMultipole::CalculateESF(Topology *top) {
01395 
01396     cout << endl << "... ... Calculating ESF";
01397 
01398     double int2N_C = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 * 1.000e-18;
01399 
01400     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01401     // Load grid from file //
01402     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01403 
01404     vector<vec> gridPoints;
01405     double CONVERT2NM = 1;
01406 
01407     std::string line;
01408     std::ifstream intt;
01409     intt.open(this->_esfGridFile.c_str());
01410 
01411     if (intt.is_open() ) {
01412 
01413         while ( intt.good() ) {
01414 
01415 
01416             std::getline(intt, line);
01417             vector<string> split;
01418             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
01419             toker.ToVector(split);
01420 
01421             if ( !split.size()      ||
01422                   split[0] == "!"   ||
01423                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
01424 
01425             // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
01426             // Units bohr
01427 
01428             //  -0.3853409355   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545
01429             //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
01430             // ! ...
01431 
01432             // Units used
01433             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
01434                 string units = split[1];
01435 
01436                 if      (units == "bohr") { CONVERT2NM = 0.0529189379; }
01437                 else if (units == "nm") { CONVERT2NM = 1.; }
01438                 else if (units == "A") { CONVERT2NM = 0.1; }
01439                 else {
01440                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
01441                                             + _esfGridFile + " not supported.");
01442                 }
01443             }
01444 
01445             else {
01446 
01447                 double x = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
01448                 double y = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
01449                 double z = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
01450 
01451                 gridPoints.push_back(vec(x,y,z));
01452             }
01453         }
01454     }
01455     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << _esfGridFile << endl; }
01456 
01457     this->_esfGrid = gridPoints;
01458 
01459     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01460     // Iterate over segment types (in GDMA config) //
01461     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01462 
01463     map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
01464     for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
01465          sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
01466          ++sit) {
01467 
01468         cout << endl << "... ... ... ESF for segment " << sit->first << flush;
01469 
01470 
01471 
01472         vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
01473         vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
01474 
01475         for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
01476 
01477             // Multipole data for this state?
01478             bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
01479             if (!hasState) { continue; }
01480 
01481             // Store the field
01482             vector< vec > gridPointESF;
01483 
01484             // Charge container appropriately
01485             for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01486                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01487             }
01488 
01489             // Calculate field for each grid point, store in gridPointESF
01490             Interactor actor = Interactor(top, this);
01491 
01492             vector< vec >::iterator grit;
01493             for (grit = _esfGrid.begin(); grit < _esfGrid.end(); ++grit) {
01494 
01495                 vec F = vec(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01496 
01497                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01498                     F += actor.FieldPermESF((*grit), *(*pit));
01499                 }
01500                 gridPointESF.push_back(F);
01501             }
01502 
01503             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... State " << state << ": "
01504                          << " Calculated field at " << gridPointESF.size()
01505                          << " grid points. " << flush;
01506 
01507 
01508             // Write to file
01509             FILE *out;
01510             string esfOutFile =  sit->first
01511                             + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
01512                             + "_" + _esfOutFile;
01513 
01514             out = fopen(esfOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01515 
01516             assert(_esfGrid.size() == gridPointESF.size());
01517             int g = 0;
01518             int p = 0;
01519             for ( ; p < gridPointESF.size(); ++g, ++p) {
01520 
01521                 fprintf(out, " %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f   %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f \n",
01522                         _esfGrid[g].getX(),
01523                         _esfGrid[g].getY(),
01524                         _esfGrid[g].getZ(),
01525                         gridPointESF[p].getX(),
01526                         gridPointESF[p].getY(),
01527                         gridPointESF[p].getZ() );
01528             }
01529         }
01530     }
01531 }
01532 
01533 
01538 void EMultipole::CalculateAlphaInput(Topology *top) {
01539 
01540     cout << endl << "... ... Calculating site polarizabilities";
01541 
01542     map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
01543     for (sit = _map_seg_polarSites.begin();
01544          sit != _map_seg_polarSites.end();
01545          ++sit) {
01546 
01547         cout << endl << "... ... ... Polarizability for segment "
01548              << sit->first << flush;
01549 
01550         FILE *out;
01551         string alphaOutFile = sit->first + "_" + _alphaOutFile;
01552         out = fopen(alphaOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01553 
01554         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01555 
01556         // Neutral state
01557         int state = 0;
01558         if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
01559 
01560             for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01561                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01562             }
01563             
01564             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... NEUTRAL " << state;
01565             fprintf(out, "[ NEUTRAL ] \n");
01566             this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
01567         }
01568 
01569         // Cationic state
01570         state = +1;        
01571         if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
01572 
01573             for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01574                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01575             }
01576 
01577             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... CATION " << state;
01578             fprintf(out, "\n\n[ CATION ] \n");
01579             this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
01580         }
01581 
01582         // Anionic state
01583         state = -1;
01584         if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
01585 
01586             for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01587                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01588             }
01589 
01590             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... ANION " << state;
01591             fprintf(out, "\n\n[ ANION ] \n");
01592             this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
01593         }
01594 
01595         // Not necessary, still: Charge back to neutral state
01596         for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01597                 (*pit)->Charge(0);
01598         }
01599 
01600     }
01601 }
01602 
01603 
01607 void EMultipole::CalculateAlphaRigid(vector< PolarSite* > &poles,
01608                                       FILE *out, bool system) {
01609 
01610     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01611 
01612     double axx, axy, axz;             // |
01613     double ayx, ayy, ayz;             // |-> Polarizability tensor
01614     double azx, azy, azz;             // |
01615 
01616     double siteU1x, siteU1y, siteU1z; // |-> Molecular ind. dipole
01617 
01618     double extFx, extFy, extFz;       // |-> External applied field
01619 
01620     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01621     // External field in x-direction //
01622     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01623 
01624     siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
01625 
01626     extFx = 0.1;
01627     extFy = 0.0;
01628     extFz = 0.0;
01629 
01630     // Set permanent field
01631     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01632         (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
01633         (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
01634         (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
01635     }
01636 
01637     // Calculate induction field
01638     this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
01639 
01640     // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
01641     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01642         siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
01643         siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
01644         siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
01645     }
01646 
01647     // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
01648     axx = - siteU1x / extFx;
01649     ayx = - siteU1y / extFx;
01650     azx = - siteU1z / extFx;
01651 
01652     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01653     // External field in y-direction //
01654     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01655 
01656     siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
01657 
01658     extFx = 0.0;
01659     extFy = 0.1;
01660     extFz = 0.0;
01661 
01662     // Set permanent field
01663     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01664         (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
01665         (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
01666         (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
01667     }
01668 
01669     // Calculate induction field
01670     this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
01671 
01672     // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
01673     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01674         siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
01675         siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
01676         siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
01677     }
01678 
01679     // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
01680     axy = - siteU1x / extFy;
01681     ayy = - siteU1y / extFy;
01682     azy = - siteU1z / extFy;
01683 
01684     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01685     // External field in z-direction //
01686     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01687 
01688     siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
01689 
01690     extFx = 0.0;
01691     extFy = 0.0;
01692     extFz = 0.1;
01693 
01694     // Set permanent field
01695     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01696         (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
01697         (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
01698         (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
01699     }
01700 
01701     // Calculate induction field
01702     this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
01703 
01704     // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
01705     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01706         siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
01707         siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
01708         siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
01709     }
01710 
01711     // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
01712     axz = - siteU1x / extFz;
01713     ayz = - siteU1y / extFz;
01714     azz = - siteU1z / extFz;
01715 
01716     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01717     // Sum, Trace, Diagonalization //
01718     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01719 
01720     // Sum over atomic polarizabilities
01721     double SUM_alpha = 0.0;
01722     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01723         SUM_alpha += (*pit)->P1;
01724     }
01725 
01726     double NM3_2_A3 = 1000.;
01727     SUM_alpha *= NM3_2_A3;
01728 
01729     // TODO Diagonalize polarizability tensor
01730     // For now, trace is enough
01731     double ISO_alpha = (axx + ayy + azz) / 3.;
01732 
01733     ISO_alpha *= NM3_2_A3;
01734 
01735     // Eigenvalues of polarizability tensor
01736     matrix alpha = matrix( vec(axx,ayx,azx),
01737                            vec(axy,ayy,azy),
01738                            vec(axz,ayz,azz) );
01739     matrix::eigensystem_t EIGEN;
01740     alpha.SolveEigensystem(EIGEN);
01741 
01742 
01743     if (! system) {
01744         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... Sum over atomic alphas:    "
01745              << SUM_alpha << " A**3.";
01746         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... 1/3 trace of alpha tensor: "
01747              << ISO_alpha << " A**3.";
01748         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... Eigenvalues: "
01749              << EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3, "
01750              << EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3, "
01751              << EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3. ";
01752     }
01753 
01754     if (_alphaOutFile != "noname" && _alphaOutFile != "") {
01755 
01756         vec x = EIGEN.eigenvecs[0];
01757         vec y = EIGEN.eigenvecs[1];
01758         vec z = EIGEN.eigenvecs[2];
01759 
01760         if (! system) {
01761             fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor in global frame \n");
01762             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", axx*NM3_2_A3, axy*NM3_2_A3, axz*NM3_2_A3);
01763             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", ayx*NM3_2_A3, ayy*NM3_2_A3, ayz*NM3_2_A3);
01764             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", azx*NM3_2_A3, azy*NM3_2_A3, azz*NM3_2_A3);
01765             fprintf(out, "\n");
01766             fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor in eigenframe \n");
01767             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3,0.,0.);
01768             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", 0.,EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3,0.);
01769             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", 0.,0.,EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3);
01770             fprintf(out, "\n");
01771             fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor main axes \n");
01772             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", x.getX(),x.getY(),x.getZ());
01773             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", y.getX(),y.getY(),y.getZ());
01774             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", z.getX(),z.getY(),z.getZ());
01775         }
01776         else {
01777             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f ",
01778                          ISO_alpha, SUM_alpha,
01779                          EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3,
01780                          EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3,
01781                          EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3);
01782         }
01783     }
01784 }
01785 
01786 
01791 void EMultipole::SiteAlphaInduce(Topology *top, vector<PolarSite*> &poles) {
01792 
01793     int    maxIter = this->_maxIter;
01794     double wSOR = this->_wSOR_N;
01795     double eTOL = this->_epsTol;
01796 
01797     vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit1;
01798     vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit2;
01799 
01800     Interactor actor = Interactor(top, this);
01801 
01802     // Induce to first order
01803     for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01804         (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
01805     }
01806 
01807 
01808     int iter = 0;
01809     for ( ; iter < maxIter; ++iter) {
01810 
01811         // Reset induction field
01812         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01813             (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
01814         }
01815 
01816         // Calculate higher-order induction field
01817         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01818             for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < poles.end(); ++pit2) {
01819                 actor.FieldInduAlpha(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
01820             }
01821         }
01822 
01823         // Induce dipoles
01824         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01825             (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
01826         }
01827 
01828         // Check for convergence
01829         bool converged = true;
01830         double maxdU = -1;
01831         double avgdU = 0.0;
01832         int    baseN = 0;
01833 
01834         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01835              double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
01836              avgdU += dU;
01837              ++baseN;
01838              if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
01839              if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
01840         }
01841 
01842         avgdU /= baseN;
01843         if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
01844 
01845         //cout << endl << "ITER" << iter << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
01846         //     << " | AVG dU " << avgdU;
01847 
01848         // Break if converged
01849         if (converged) { break; }
01850         else if (iter == maxIter - 1) {
01851             cout << endl << "... ... ... "
01852                  << "WARNING Induced multipoles did not converge to precision: "
01853                  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
01854             break;
01855         }
01856     }
01857 }
01858 
01859 
01866 void EMultipole::DistributeMpoles(Topology *top) {
01867 
01868     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01869     // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
01870     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01871 
01872     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
01873     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01874          sit < top->Segments().end();
01875          ++sit) {
01876 
01877         Segment *seg = *sit;
01878         vector<PolarSite*> poleSites = _map_seg_polarSites.at(seg->getName());
01879         seg->setChrgStates(_map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()]);
01880 
01881         bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
01882 
01883         vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
01884         for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
01885              fit < seg->Fragments().end();
01886              ++fit) {
01887             
01888             Fragment *frag = *fit;
01889 
01890             string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
01891                          + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
01892             vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
01893             vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
01894 
01895             if (map2md) {
01896                 if (polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
01897                     cout << endl << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName() <<
01898                             " Fragment " << frag->getName() <<
01899                             ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar sites "
01900                             " as there are atoms to perform mapping. " << endl;
01901                     throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
01902                 }
01903             }
01904 
01905 
01906             for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
01907 
01908                 string name = namesInFrag[i];
01909                 int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
01910 
01911                 PolarSite *templ = poleSites[poleId-1];
01912                 PolarSite *newSite = top->AddPolarSite(name);
01913                 newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
01914                 seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01915                 frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01916 
01917                 // Shift + rotate
01918                 if (!map2md) {
01919                     newSite->Translate(frag->getTransQM2MD());
01920                     newSite->Rotate(frag->getRotQM2MD(), frag->getCoMD());
01921                 }
01922                 else {
01923                     vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
01924                     newSite->setPos(mdpos);
01925                     if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
01926                         cout << endl << "ERROR: MAP2MD = TRUE "
01927                         " prevents use of higher-rank multipoles. " << endl;
01928                         throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
01929                     }
01930                 }
01931             }
01932         }
01933     }
01934 
01935     top->setIsEStatified(true);
01936 
01937 }
01938 
01939 
01946 bool EMultipole::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
01947 
01948     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01949     // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
01950     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01951 
01952     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
01953     if (!top->isRigid()) {
01954         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
01955         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
01956     }
01957     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
01958 
01959     // Forward multipoles to topology
01960     if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
01961         this->DistributeMpoles(top);
01962         cout << endl << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
01963                  << " multipole sites.";
01964     }
01965     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already estatified."; }
01966 
01967     if (_checkPolesPDB != "") {
01968         cout << endl << "... ... Writing polar-site coordinates to "
01969              << _checkPolesPDB << ". " << flush;
01970         // To check rotation into global frame
01971         string mpNAME = _checkPolesPDB;
01972         FILE *mpPDB = NULL;
01973         mpPDB = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01974         vector<Segment*>::iterator sit;
01975         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01976              sit < top->Segments().end();
01977              ++sit) {
01978             (*sit)->WritePDB(mpPDB, "Multipoles", "MD");
01979         }
01980         fclose(mpPDB);
01981     }
01982 
01983     if (_calcESP && _ESPdoSystem) {
01984         this->CalculateESPRigid(top);
01985     }
01986 
01987     // What has already been done? If anything at all, return 0.
01988     if ( (_calcAlphaMol && !_doSystem) || _calcESP || _calcESF) {
01989 
01990         cout << endl << "... ... Calculated ";
01991 
01992         if (this->_calcAlphaMol) {
01993             cout << "site polarizability tensors, ";
01994         }
01995         if (this->_calcESP) {
01996             cout << "ESPs, ";
01997         }
01998         if (this->_calcESF) {
01999             cout << "ESFs, ";
02000         }
02001         cout << "return. ";
02002         return 0;
02003     }
02004 
02005     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02006     // Polarizabilities for all sites in system //
02007     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02008 
02009     if (_calcAlphaMol && _doSystem) {
02010 
02011         cout << endl << "... ... Calculating site polarizabilities" << endl;
02012 
02013         FILE *out;
02014         string alphaOutFile =
02015                 "Frame" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
02016                 + "_" + _alphaOutFile;
02017         out = fopen(alphaOutFile.c_str(), "w");
02018 
02019         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
02020         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02021         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
02022              sit < top->Segments().end();
02023              ++sit) {
02024 
02025             vector< PolarSite* > poles = (*sit)->PolarSites();
02026 
02027 
02028             cout << "\r... ... ... Segment " << (*sit)->getId() << " " << flush;
02029 
02030             fprintf(out, "%4d %4s ", (*sit)->getId(),(*sit)->getName().c_str());
02031 
02032             int state = 0;
02033             if ( (*sit)->hasChrgState(state) ) {
02034                 fprintf(out, "N ");
02035                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02036                     (*pit)->Charge(state);
02037                 }
02038                 this->CalculateAlphaRigid(poles, out, true);
02039             }
02040 
02041             state = -1;
02042             if ( (*sit)->hasChrgState(state) ) {
02043                 fprintf(out, "A ");
02044                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02045                     (*pit)->Charge(state);
02046                 }
02047                 this->CalculateAlphaRigid(poles, out, true);
02048             }    
02049 
02050             state = +1;
02051             if ( (*sit)->hasChrgState(state) ) {
02052                 fprintf(out, "C ");
02053                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02054                     (*pit)->Charge(state);
02055                 }
02056                 this->CalculateAlphaRigid(poles, out, true);
02057             }
02058 
02059             for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02060                 (*pit)->Charge(0);
02061             }
02062 
02063             fprintf(out, " \n");
02064         }
02065 
02066         return 0;
02067     }
02068 
02069 
02070     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02071     // Create + start threads (Site Ops) //
02072     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02073 
02074     vector<SiteOpMultipole*> siteOps;    
02075 
02076     _nextSite = top->Segments().begin();
02077 
02078     // Forward to first segment specified in options
02079     for ( ; (*_nextSite)->getId() != this->_firstSeg &&
02080               _nextSite < top->Segments().end(); ++_nextSite) { ; }
02081 
02082     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02083         SiteOpMultipole *newOp = new SiteOpMultipole(id, top, this);
02084         siteOps.push_back(newOp);
02085     }
02086 
02087     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02088         siteOps[id]->InitSlotData(top);
02089     }
02090 
02091     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02092         siteOps[id]->Start();
02093     }
02094 
02095     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02096         siteOps[id]->WaitDone();
02097     }
02098 
02099     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02100         delete siteOps[id];
02101     }
02102 
02103     siteOps.clear();
02104 
02105 
02106     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
02107     // Print numbers to file //
02108     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
02109 
02110     if (_energies2File) {
02111 
02112         FILE *out;
02113         string topOutFile = "Frame"
02114                           + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
02115                           + "_" + _outFile;
02116         out = fopen(topOutFile.c_str(), "w");
02117 
02118         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
02119         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
02120              sit < top->Segments().end();
02121              ++sit) {
02122 
02123             if ((*sit)->getId() < _firstSeg ) { continue; }
02124 
02125             fprintf(out, "%4d ", (*sit)->getId() );
02126             fprintf(out, "%4s ", (*sit)->getName().c_str() );
02127 
02128             // Energies
02129             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
02130                 fprintf(out, "   0 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(0) );
02131             }
02132             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
02133                 fprintf(out, "  -1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(-1) );
02134             }
02135 
02136             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
02137                 fprintf(out, "  +1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(+1) );
02138             }
02139 
02140             // Iterations
02141             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
02142                 fprintf(out, "   0 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][1]);
02143             }
02144             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
02145                 fprintf(out, "  -1 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][0]);
02146             }
02147 
02148             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
02149                 fprintf(out, "  +1 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][2]);
02150             }
02151 
02152             // Polarizable sphere
02153             fprintf(out, "   SPH %4d   ",
02154                     _log_seg_sphereSize[(*sit)->getId()]);
02155 
02156             fprintf(out, "   %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f   ",
02157                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getX(),
02158                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getY(),
02159                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getZ());            
02160 
02161             fprintf(out, " \n");
02162 
02163             if ( (*sit)->getId() == _lastSeg ) { break; }
02164         }
02165     }
02166 
02167     this->PostProcess(top);
02168     return 1;
02169 }
02170 
02171 
02172 // +++++++++++++++++ //
02173 // Thread Management //
02174 // +++++++++++++++++ //
02175 
02176 
02181 Segment *EMultipole::RequestNextSite(int opId, Topology *top) {
02182 
02183     _nextSiteMutex.Lock();
02184 
02185     Segment *workOnThis;
02186
