02187     if (_nextSite == top->Segments().end()) {
02188         workOnThis = NULL;
02189     }
02190     else if ((*_nextSite)->getId() > _lastSeg && _lastSeg > 0) {
02191         workOnThis = NULL;
02192     }
02193     else {
02194         workOnThis = *_nextSite;
02195         _nextSite++;
02196         cout << endl << "... ... OP " << opId
02197              << " evaluating energy for site "
02198              << workOnThis->getId() << flush;
02199     }
02200 
02201     _nextSiteMutex.Unlock();
02202 
02203     return workOnThis;
02204 }
02205 
02206 
02207 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02208 // SiteOperator Member Functions //
02209 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02210 
02211 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Run(void) {
02212 
02213     while (true) {
02214 
02215         _seg = _master->RequestNextSite(_id, _top);
02216 
02217         if (_seg == NULL) { break; }
02218         else { this->EvalSite(_top, _seg); }
02219     }
02220 }
02221 
02222 
02227 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
02228     
02229 
02230     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
02231     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
02232     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
02233     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
02234     
02235     _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
02236     assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
02237 
02238     for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
02239          sitRef < top->Segments().end();
02240          ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
02241 
02242         (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
02243 
02244         for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
02245              pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
02246              pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
02247              ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
02248 
02249             *pitNew = new PolarSite();
02250             (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
02251             (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
02252         }
02253     }
02254 }
02255 
02256 
02260 EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::~SiteOpMultipole() {
02261 
02262     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
02263     vector<PolarSite*> ::iterator pol;
02264 
02265     for (sit = _polarSites.begin(); sit < _polarSites.end(); ++sit) {
02266         for (pol = (*sit).begin(); pol < (*sit).end(); ++pol) {
02267             delete *pol;
02268         }
02269         (*sit).clear();
02270     }
02271     _polarSites.clear();
02272 }
02273 
02274 
02281 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg) {
02282 
02283     double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
02284 
02285     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02286     // Define polarization sphere //
02287     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02288 
02289     this->_segsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Segments within cutoff
02290     this->_polsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff
02291 
02292     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
02293     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
02294 
02295         if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(),seg->getPos()))
02296                 > _master->_cutoff) { continue; }
02297         else {
02298             _segsPolSphere.push_back(*sit);
02299             _polsPolSphere.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
02300         }
02301     }
02302 
02303     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02304     // Investigate charge states //
02305     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02306 
02307     if (_master->_maverick) {
02308         cout << endl
02309              << "... ... ... Segments in polarization sphere: "
02310              << _segsPolSphere.size() << flush;
02311     }
02312     
02313     this->Depolarize();
02314 
02315     // Keep track of number of iterations needed until converged
02316     vector<int> iters;
02317     iters.resize(3);
02318 
02319     int state = 0;
02320     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
02321 
02322         if (_master->_maverick) {
02323             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
02324                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
02325         }
02326 
02327         this->Charge(state);
02328         int iter = 0;
02329         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
02330         double EState = this->Energy(state);
02331         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
02332         iters[state+1] = iter;
02333 
02334 
02335         
02336         FILE *out;
02337         string toFile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(_seg->getId())
02338                       + "_R_absU_N.dat";
02339         out = fopen(toFile.c_str(), "w");
02340         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02341         vector< vector< PolarSite* > > ::iterator sit;
02342         vec CoM = _seg->getPos();
02343         for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02344             for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
02345                 vec r  = _top->PbShortestConnect((*pit)->getPos(), CoM);
02346                 int segId = (*pit)->getSegment()->getId();
02347                 double R = abs(r);
02348                 vec u = vec( (*pit)->U1x, (*pit)->U1y, (*pit)->U1z );
02349                 // double U = abs(u);
02350                 fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f  %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4d\n",
02351                               R, r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), u.getX(), u.getY(), u.getZ(), segId);
02352             }
02353         }
02354         fclose(out);
02355         
02356         
02357 //        // For visual check of convergence
02358 //        string mpNAME = "seg1_cation.dat";
02359 //        FILE *mpDat = NULL;
02360 //        mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
02361 //        vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
02362 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
02363 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
02364 //             ++pit) {
02365 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02366 //        }
02367 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[1].begin();
02368 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[1].end();
02369 //             ++pit) {
02370 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02371 //        }
02372 //        fclose(mpDat);
02373         
02374         // this->Depolarize(); // OVERRIDE
02375         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02376         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02377         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02378             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02379                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02380                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldP();
02381                 (*pit1)->ResetU1Hist();
02382             }
02383         }
02384     }
02385 
02386     state = -1;
02387     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
02388 
02389         if (_master->_maverick) {
02390             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
02391                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
02392         }
02393 
02394         this->Charge(state);
02395         int iter = 0;
02396         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
02397         double EState = this->Energy(state);
02398         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
02399         iters[state+1] = iter;
02400 
02401         /*
02402         // For visual check of convergence
02403         string mpNAME = "seg1_cation.dat";
02404         FILE *mpDat = NULL;
02405         mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
02406         vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
02407         for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
02408              pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
02409              ++pit) {
02410             (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02411         }
02412         fclose(mpDat);
02413         */
02414 
02415         // this->Depolarize(); // OVERRIDE
02416         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02417         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02418         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02419             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02420                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02421                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldP();
02422                 (*pit1)->ResetU1Hist();
02423             }
02424         }
02425     }
02426 
02427     state = +1;
02428     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
02429 
02430         if (_master->_maverick) {
02431             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
02432                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
02433         }
02434         
02435         this->Charge(state);
02436         int iter = 0;
02437         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
02438         double EState = this->Energy(state);
02439         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
02440         iters[state+1] = iter;
02441 
02442 
02443         
02444         FILE *out;
02445         string toFile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(_seg->getId())
02446                       + "_R_absU_C.dat";
02447         out = fopen(toFile.c_str(), "w");
02448         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02449         vector< vector< PolarSite* > > ::iterator sit;
02450         vec CoM = _seg->getPos();
02451         for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02452             for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
02453                 vec r  = _top->PbShortestConnect((*pit)->getPos(), CoM);
02454                 int segId = (*pit)->getSegment()->getId();
02455                 double R = abs(r);
02456                 vec u = vec( (*pit)->U1x, (*pit)->U1y, (*pit)->U1z );
02457                 // double U = abs(u);
02458                 fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f  %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4d \n",
02459                               R, r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), u.getX(), u.getY(), u.getZ(), segId);
02460             }
02461         }
02462         fclose(out);
02463         
02464         
02465 //        // For visual check of convergence
02466 //        string mpNAME = "seg1_neutral.dat";
02467 //        FILE *mpDat = NULL;
02468 //        mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
02469 //        vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
02470 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
02471 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
02472 //             ++pit) {
02473 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02474 //        }
02475 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[1].begin();
02476 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[1].end();
02477 //             ++pit) {
02478 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02479 //        }
02480 //        fclose(mpDat);
02481         
02482         
02483         this->Depolarize();
02484 
02485     }
02486 
02487     this->_master->_logMutex.Lock();
02488     _master->_log_seg_iter[_seg->getId()] = iters;
02489     _master->_log_seg_sphereSize[_seg->getId()] = _polsPolSphere.size();
02490     _master->_log_seg_com[_seg->getId()] = _seg->getPos();
02491     this->_master->_logMutex.Unlock();
02492 
02493     this->Charge(0);
02494 
02495 }
02496 
02497 
02502 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Charge(int state) {
02503 
02504     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02505     for (pit = _polarSites[_seg->getId()-1].begin();
02506          pit < _polarSites[_seg->getId()-1].end();
02507          ++pit) {
02508 
02509         (*pit)->Charge(state);
02510     }
02511 }
02512 
02513 
02517 int EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Induce(int state) {
02518 
02519     double wSOR = (state == 0) ? _master->_wSOR_N : _master->_wSOR_C;
02520     double eTOL = this->_master->_epsTol;
02521     int    maxI = this->_master->_maxIter;
02522 
02523     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02524     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
02525     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02526     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
02527 
02528     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02529     // Inter-site fields (arising from perm. m'poles) //
02530     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02531 
02532 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... 0th-order field" << flush;
02533     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02534          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02535          ++sit1) {
02536     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
02537          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02538          ++sit2) {
02539 
02540          for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02541          for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02542 
02543              _actor.FieldPerm(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02544          }}
02545     }}
02546 
02547     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
02548     // 1st-order induction //
02549     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
02550 
02551 //    cout << " | Induce " << endl;
02552     if (state == 0) { // OVERRIDE
02553         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02554              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02555              ++sit1) {
02556 
02557              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02558                  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
02559              }
02560         }
02561     }
02562 
02563 
02564 
02565     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02566     // Higher-order induction //
02567     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02568 
02569     int iter = 0;
02570 //    boost::progress_timer T;
02571     for ( ; iter < maxI; ++iter) {
02572 
02573         // Reset fields FUx, FUy, FUz
02574 //        cout << "\r... ... ... Reset (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02575         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02576              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02577              ++sit1) {
02578 
02579             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02580                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02581             }
02582         }
02583 
02584         // Intra-site contribution to induction field
02585 //        cout << " | Intra-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02586         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02587              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02588              ++sit1) {
02589 
02590             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02591             for (pit2 = pit1 + 1;        pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
02592 
02593                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
02594             }}
02595         }
02596 
02597         // Inter-site contribution to induction field
02598 //        cout << " | Inter-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02599         //boost::progress_display show_progress( _polsPolSphere.size() );
02600 //        T.restart();
02601         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02602              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02603              ++sit1) {
02604         for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
02605              sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02606              ++sit2) {
02607 
02608             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02609             for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02610 
02611                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02612             }}
02613         }}
02614 //        cout << " | dt " << T.elapsed() << flush;
02615 
02616         // Induce again
02617 //        cout << " | Induce (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02618         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02619              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02620              ++sit1) {
02621 
02622              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02623                  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
02624              }
02625         }        
02626 
02627         // Check for convergence
02628 //        cout << " | Check (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02629         bool converged = true;
02630         double maxdU = -1;
02631         double avgdU = 0.0;
02632         int    baseN = 0;
02633         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02634              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02635              ++sit1) {
02636 
02637              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02638                  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
02639                  avgdU += dU;
02640                  ++baseN;
02641                  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
02642                  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
02643              }
02644         }
02645         avgdU /= baseN;
02646         if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
02647 
02648 //        cout << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
02649 //             << " | AVG dU " << avgdU
02650 //             << " | SOR " << wSOR << flush;
02651 
02652         // Break if converged
02653         if      (converged) {
02654             break;
02655         }
02656         else if (iter == maxI - 1) {
02657             this->_master->LockCout();
02658             cout << endl << "... ... ... WARNING Induced multipoles for site "
02659                  << _seg->getId() << " - state " << state 
02660                  << " did not converge to precision: "
02661                  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
02662             this->_master->UnlockCout();
02663             break;
02664         }
02665     }
02666 
02667     return iter;
02668     
02669 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state
02670 //         << " - wSOR " << wSOR
02671 //         << " - Iterations " << iter << flush;
02672 }
02673 
02674 
02678 double EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Energy(int state) {
02679 
02680     _actor.ResetEnergy();
02681     double E_Tot = 0.0;
02682 
02683     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
02684     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
02685     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02686     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
02687     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02688     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
02689 
02690     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02691     // Inter-site energy //
02692     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02693 
02694     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
02695          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02696          ++sit1, ++seg1) {
02697     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1, seg2 = seg1 + 1;
02698          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02699          ++sit2, ++seg2) {
02700 
02701         //if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*seg1)->getPos(),_seg->getPos()))
02702         //        > _master->_cutoff) { throw runtime_error("Not this."); }
02703 
02704         //cout << "\r... ... Calculating interaction energy for pair "
02705         //     << (*seg1)->getId() << "|" << (*seg2)->getId() << "   " << flush;
02706 
02707 
02708         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02709         for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02710 
02711             //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
02712             //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
02713 
02714             E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02715 
02716         }}
02717     }}
02718 
02719     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02720     // Intra-site energy //
02721     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02722 
02723     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
02724          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02725          ++sit1, ++seg1) {
02726 
02727         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02728         for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
02729 
02730 //            E_Tot += _actor.EnergyIntra(*(*pit1), *(*pit2)); // OVERRIDE
02731 
02732         }}
02733     }
02734     
02735     if (_master->_maverick) {
02736         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot
02737              << " = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()
02738              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER()
02739              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA()
02740              << flush;
02741     }
02742 
02743     return E_Tot;
02744 }
02745 
02746 
02751 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Depolarize() {
02752 
02753     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
02754     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02755 
02756     for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02757         for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
02758 
02759             (*pit)->Depolarize();
02760         }
02761     }
02762 }
02763 
02764 
02765 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02766 // Interactor Member Functions //
02767 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02768 
02772 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::PotentialPerm(vec r,
02773                                                      PolarSite &pol) {
02774 
02775     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02776     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
02777     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02778     R2   = R*R;
02779     R3   = R2*R;
02780     R4   = R3*R;
02781     R5   = R4*R;
02782     e12 *= R;
02783 
02784     
02785 
02786 
02787     rbx = - pol._locX * e12;
02788     rby = - pol._locY * e12;
02789     rbz = - pol._locZ * e12;
02790 
02791     double phi00 = 0.0;
02792     
02793         phi00 += T00_00() * pol.Q00;
02794     
02795     if (pol._rank > 0) {        
02796         phi00 += T00_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02797         phi00 += T00_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02798         phi00 += T00_1z() * pol.Q1z;        
02799     }
02800         
02801     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02802         phi00 += T00_20()  * pol.Q20;
02803         phi00 += T00_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02804         phi00 += T00_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02805         phi00 += T00_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02806         phi00 += T00_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02807     }
02808 
02809     return phi00;
02810 }
02811 
02815 inline vec EMultipole::Interactor::FieldPermESF(vec r,
02816                                                  PolarSite &pol) {
02817     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02818     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
02819     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02820     R2   = R*R;
02821     R3   = R2*R;
02822     R4   = R3*R;
02823     R5   = R4*R;
02824     e12 *= R;
02825 
02826         rax = e12.getX();
02827         ray = e12.getY();
02828         raz = e12.getZ();
02829         rbx = - rax;
02830         rby = - ray;
02831         rbz = - raz;
02832 
02833         cxx = 1;
02834         cxy = 0;
02835         cxz = 0;
02836         cyx = 0;
02837         cyy = 1;
02838         cyz = 0;
02839         czx = 0;
02840         czy = 0;
02841         czz = 1;
02842 
02843     double Fx = 0.0;
02844     double Fy = 0.0;
02845     double Fz = 0.0;
02846 
02847     // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
02848         Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
02849         Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
02850         Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
02851 
02852     // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
02853     if (pol._rank > 0) {
02854         Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02855         Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02856         Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02857 
02858         Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02859         Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02860         Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02861 
02862         Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02863         Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02864         Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02865     }
02866 
02867     // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
02868     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02869         Fx += T1x_20()  * pol.Q20;
02870         Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02871         Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02872         Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02873         Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02874 
02875         Fy += T1y_20()  * pol.Q20;
02876         Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02877         Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02878         Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02879         Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02880 
02881         Fz += T1z_20()  * pol.Q20;
02882         Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02883         Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02884         Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02885         Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02886     }
02887 
02888     return vec(Fx, Fy, Fz);
02889 }
02890 
02894 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1,
02895                                                     PolarSite &pol2) {
02896     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02897     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
02898     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02899     R2   = R*R;
02900     R3   = R2*R;
02901     R4   = R3*R;
02902     R5   = R4*R;
02903     e12 *= R;
02904 
02905     // Thole damping init.
02906     a    = _em->_aDamp;
02907     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02908 
02909 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02910 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02911 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02912 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02913 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02914 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02915 
02916         rax = e12.getX();
02917         ray = e12.getY();
02918         raz = e12.getZ();
02919         rbx = - rax;
02920         rby = - ray;
02921         rbz = - raz;
02922 
02923 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02924 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02925 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02926 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02927 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02928 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02929 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02930 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02931 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02932 
02933         cxx = 1;
02934         cxy = 0;
02935         cxz = 0;
02936         cyx = 0;
02937         cyy = 1;
02938         cyz = 0;
02939         czx = 0;
02940         czy = 0;
02941         czz = 1;
02942 
02943     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
02944 
02945     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02946         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02947         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02948         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02949         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02950         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02951         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02952         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02953         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02954         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02955 
02956         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02957         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02958         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02959         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02960         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02961         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02962         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02963         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02964         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02965     }
02966     else {
02967         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02968         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02969         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02970         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02971         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02972         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02973         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02974         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02975         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02976 
02977         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02978         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02979         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02980         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02981         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02982         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02983         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02984         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02985         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02986     }
02987 }
02988 
02992 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1,
02993                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
02994 
02995     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02996     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
02997     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
02998     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02999     R2   = R*R;
03000     R3   = R2*R;
03001     R4   = R3*R;
03002     R5   = R4*R;
03003     e12 *= R;
03004 
03005     // Thole damping init.
03006     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03007     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03008 
03009 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03010 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03011 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03012 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03013 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03014 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03015 
03016         rax = e12.getX();
03017         ray = e12.getY();
03018         raz = e12.getZ();
03019         rbx = - rax;
03020         rby = - ray;
03021         rbz = - raz;
03022 
03023 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03024 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03025 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03026 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03027 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03028 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03029 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03030 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03031 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03032 
03033         cxx = 1;
03034         cxy = 0;
03035         cxz = 0;
03036         cyx = 0;
03037         cyy = 1;
03038         cyz = 0;
03039         czx = 0;
03040         czy = 0;
03041         czz = 1;
03042 
03043     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
03044 
03045     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03046         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03047         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03048         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03049         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03050         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03051         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03052         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03053         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03054         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03055 
03056         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
03057         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
03058         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
03059         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
03060         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
03061         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
03062         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
03063         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
03064         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
03065     }
03066     else {
03067         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03068         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03069         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03070         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03071         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03072         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03073         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03074         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03075         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03076 
03077         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
03078         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
03079         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
03080         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
03081         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
03082         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
03083         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
03084         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
03085         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;  
03086     }
03087 }
03088 
03092 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1,
03093                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
03094 
03095     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03096     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
03097     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03098     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03099     R2   = R*R;
03100     R3   = R2*R;
03101     R4   = R3*R;
03102     R5   = R4*R;
03103     e12 *= R;
03104 
03105 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03106 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03107 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03108 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03109 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03110 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03111 
03112         rax = e12.getX();
03113         ray = e12.getY();
03114         raz = e12.getZ();
03115         rbx = - rax;
03116         rby = - ray;
03117         rbz = - raz;
03118 
03119     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03120 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03121 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03122 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03123 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03124 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03125 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03126 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03127 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03128 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03129 
03130         cxx = 1;
03131         cxy = 0;
03132         cxz = 0;
03133         cyx = 0;
03134         cyy = 1;
03135         cyz = 0;
03136         czx = 0;
03137         czy = 0;
03138         czz = 1;
03139     }
03140 
03141     // Fields generated by rank-0 m'poles
03142         pol1.FPx += T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03143         pol1.FPy += T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03144         pol1.FPz += T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03145 
03146         pol2.FPx += T00_1x() * pol1.Q00;
03147         pol2.FPy += T00_1y() * pol1.Q00;
03148         pol2.FPz += T00_1z() * pol1.Q00;
03149 
03150     // Fields generated by rank-1 m'poles
03151     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03152         pol1.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03153         pol1.FPx += T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03154         pol1.FPx += T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03155         pol1.FPy += T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03156         pol1.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03157         pol1.FPy += T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03158         pol1.FPz += T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03159         pol1.FPz += T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03160         pol1.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03161     }
03162     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03163         pol2.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol1.Q1x;
03164         pol2.FPx += T1y_1x() * pol1.Q1y;
03165         pol2.FPx += T1z_1x() * pol1.Q1z;
03166         pol2.FPy += T1x_1y() * pol1.Q1x;
03167         pol2.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol1.Q1y;
03168         pol2.FPy += T1z_1y() * pol1.Q1z;
03169         pol2.FPz += T1x_1z() * pol1.Q1x;
03170         pol2.FPz += T1y_1z() * pol1.Q1y;
03171         pol2.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol1.Q1z;
03172     }
03173 
03174     // Fields generated by rank-2 m'poles
03175     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03176         pol1.FPx += T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03177         pol1.FPx += T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03178         pol1.FPx += T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03179         pol1.FPx += T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03180         pol1.FPx += T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03181 
03182         pol1.FPy += T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03183         pol1.FPy += T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03184         pol1.FPy += T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03185         pol1.FPy += T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03186         pol1.FPy += T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03187 
03188         pol1.FPz += T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03189         pol1.FPz += T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03190         pol1.FPz += T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03191         pol1.FPz += T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03192         pol1.FPz += T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03193     }
03194     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03195         pol2.FPx += T20_1x()  * pol1.Q20;
03196         pol2.FPx += T21c_1x() * pol1.Q21c;
03197         pol2.FPx += T21s_1x() * pol1.Q21s;
03198         pol2.FPx += T22c_1x() * pol1.Q22c;
03199         pol2.FPx += T22s_1x() * pol1.Q22s;
03200 
03201         pol2.FPy += T20_1y()  * pol1.Q20;
03202         pol2.FPy += T21c_1y() * pol1.Q21c;
03203         pol2.FPy += T21s_1y() * pol1.Q21s;
03204         pol2.FPy += T22c_1y() * pol1.Q22c;
03205         pol2.FPy += T22s_1y() * pol1.Q22s;
03206 
03207         pol2.FPz += T20_1z()  * pol1.Q20;
03208         pol2.FPz += T21c_1z() * pol1.Q21c;
03209         pol2.FPz += T21s_1z() * pol1.Q21s;
03210         pol2.FPz += T22c_1z() * pol1.Q22c;
03211         pol2.FPz += T22s_1z() * pol1.Q22s;        
03212     }
03213 }
03214 
03218 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1,
03219                                                    PolarSite &pol2) {    
03220 
03221     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03222     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03223     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03224     R2   = R*R;
03225     R3   = R2*R;
03226     R4   = R3*R;
03227     R5   = R4*R;
03228     e12 *= R;
03229     
03230     // Thole damping init.
03231     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03232     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03233 
03234 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03235 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03236 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03237 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03238 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03239 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03240 
03241         rax = e12.getX();
03242         ray = e12.getY();
03243         raz = e12.getZ();
03244         rbx = - rax;
03245         rby = - ray;
03246         rbz = - raz;
03247 
03248     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03249 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03250 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03251 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03252 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03253 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03254 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03255 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03256 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03257 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03258 
03259         cxx = 1;
03260         cxy = 0;
03261         cxz = 0;
03262         cyx = 0;
03263         cyy = 1;
03264         cyz = 0;
03265         czx = 0;
03266         czy = 0;
03267         czz = 1;
03268     }
03269 
03270     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03271 
03272     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03273         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03274         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03275         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03276 
03277         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03278         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03279         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03280     }
03281     else {
03282         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03283         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03284         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03285 
03286         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03287         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03288         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03289     }
03290 
03291     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03292         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03293             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03294             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03295             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03296             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03297             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03298             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03299             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03300             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03301             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03302         }
03303         else {
03304             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03305             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03306             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03307             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03308             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03309             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03310             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03311             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03312             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03313         }
03314     }
03315     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03316         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03317             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03318             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03319             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03320             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03321             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03322             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03323             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03324             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03325             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03326         }
03327         else {
03328             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03329             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03330             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03331             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03332             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03333             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03334             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03335             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03336             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03337         }
03338     }
03339 
03340     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03341         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03342             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03343             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03344             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03345             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03346             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03347             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03348             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03349             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03350             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03351             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03352             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03353             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03354             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03355             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03356             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03357         }
03358         else {
03359             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03360             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03361             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03362             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03363             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03364             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03365             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03366             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03367             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03368             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03369             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03370             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03371             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03372             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03373             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03374         }
03375     }
03376     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03377         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03378             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03379             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03380             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03381             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03382             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03383             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03384             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03385             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03386             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03387             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03388             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03389             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03390             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03391             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03392             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03393         }
03394         else {
03395             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03396             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03397             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03398             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03399             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03400             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03401             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03402             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03403             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03404             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03405             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03406             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03407             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03408             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03409             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03410         }
03411     }
03412     
03413     // Take into account work needed to induce multipoles
03414     U *= 0.5;
03415 
03416     EU_INTRA += U;
03417     return U;
03418 }
03419 
03423 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1,
03424                                                    PolarSite &pol2) {
03425 
03426     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03427     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03428     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03429     R2   = R*R;
03430     R3   = R2*R;
03431     R4   = R3*R;
03432     R5   = R4*R;
03433     e12 *= R;
03434 
03435     // Thole damping init.
03436     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03437     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03438 
03439 
03440     //cout << "frag1 " << pol1.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
03441     //cout << "frag2 " << pol2.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
03442     //cout << "seg1  " << pol1.getSegment()->getId() << endl;
03443     //cout << "seg2  " << pol2.getSegment()->getId() << endl;    
03444 
03445     
03446 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03447 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03448 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03449 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03450 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03451 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03452 
03453         rax = e12.getX();
03454         ray = e12.getY();
03455         raz = e12.getZ();
03456         rbx = - rax;
03457         rby = - ray;
03458         rbz = - raz;
03459 
03460     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03461 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03462 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03463 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03464 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03465 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03466 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03467 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03468 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03469 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03470 
03471         cxx = 1;
03472         cxy = 0;
03473         cxz = 0;
03474         cyx = 0;
03475         cyy = 1;
03476         cyz = 0;
03477         czx = 0;
03478         czy = 0;
03479         czz = 1;
03480     }
03481 
03482     double E = 0.0; // <- Electrostatic energy
03483     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03484 
03485         //cout << "r1  " << pol1.getPos() << endl;
03486         //cout << "r2  " << pol2.getPos() << endl;
03487         //cout << "R   " << 1/R << endl;
03488         //cout << "e12 " << e12 << endl;
03489 
03490         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_00() * pol2.Q00;
03491 
03492         //cout << "E up to q <-> q " << E << endl;
03493 
03494     if (a*u3 < 40) {
03495         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03496         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03497         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03498 
03499         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03500         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03501         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03502     }
03503     else {
03504         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03505         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03506         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03507 
03508         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03509         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03510         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03511     }
03512 
03513 
03514 
03515     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03516         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03517         //cout << "E1x_00 " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03518         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03519         //cout << "E1y_00 " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03520         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03521         //cout << "E1z_00 " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03522     }
03523 
03524     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03525         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03526         //cout << "E00_1x " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03527         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03528         //cout << "E00_1y " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03529         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03530         //cout << "E00_1z " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03531     }
03532         //cout << "E up to q <-> d " << E << endl;
03533 
03534     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03535         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_00()  * pol2.Q00;
03536         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03537         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03538         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03539         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03540     }
03541 
03542     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03543         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03544         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03545         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03546         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03547         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03548     }
03549         //cout << "E up to q <-> Q " << E << endl;
03550 
03551     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03552         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03553         //cout << "E1x_1x " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03554         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03555         //cout << "E1x_1y " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03556         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03557         //cout << "E1x_1z " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03558 
03559         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03560         //cout << "E1y_1x " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03561         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03562         //cout << "E1y_1y " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03563         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03564         //cout << "E1y_1z " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03565 
03566         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03567         //cout << "E1z_1x " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03568         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03569         //cout << "E1z_1y " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03570         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03571         //cout << "E1z_1z " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03572     }
03573 
03574     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03575         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03576             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03577             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03578             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03579             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03580             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03581             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03582             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03583             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03584             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03585         }
03586         else {
03587             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03588             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03589             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03590             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03591             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03592             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03593             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03594             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03595             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03596         }
03597     }
03598     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03599         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03600             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03601             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03602             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03603             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03604             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03605             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03606             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03607             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03608             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03609         }
03610         else {
03611             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03612             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03613             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03614             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03615             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03616             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03617             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03618             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03619             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03620         }
03621     }    
03622         //cout << "E up to d <-> d " << E << endl;
03623 
03624     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03625         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03626         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03627         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03628 
03629         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03630         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03631         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03632 
03633         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03634         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03635         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03636 
03637         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03638         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03639         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03640 
03641         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03642         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03643         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03644     }
03645 
03646     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03647         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
03648         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
03649         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
03650 
03651         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03652         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03653         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03654 
03655         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03656         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03657         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03658 
03659         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03660         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03661         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03662 
03663         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03664         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03665         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03666     }
03667 
03668     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03669         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03670             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03671             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03672             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03673             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03674             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03675             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03676             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03677             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03678             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03679             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03680             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03681             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03682             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03683             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03684             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03685         }
03686         else {
03687             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03688             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03689             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03690             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03691             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03692             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03693             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03694             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03695             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03696             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03697             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03698             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03699             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03700             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03701             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03702         }
03703     }
03704     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03705         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03706             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03707             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03708             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03709             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03710             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03711             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03712             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03713             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03714             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03715             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03716             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03717             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03718             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03719             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03720             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03721         }
03722         else {
03723             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03724             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03725             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03726             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03727             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03728             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03729             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03730             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03731             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03732             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03733             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03734             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03735             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03736             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03737             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03738         }
03739     }
03740         //cout << "E up to d <-> Q " << E << endl;
03741 
03742     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03743         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_20()   * pol2.Q20;
03744         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03745         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03746         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03747         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03748 
03749 
03750         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03751         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03752         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03753         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03754         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03755         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03756         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03757         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03758 
03759 
03760         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03761         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03762         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03763         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03764         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03765         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03766 
03767 
03768         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03769         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03770         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03771         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03772 
03773         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03774         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03775     }
03776         //cout << "E up to Q <-> Q " << E << endl;
03777         
03778 
03779     // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
03780     U *= 0.5;
03781 
03782     EP += E;
03783     EU_INTER += U;
03784     return E + U;
03785 }
03786 
03790 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1,
03791                                                       PolarSite &pol2) {
03792     
03793     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03794     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
03795     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03796     R2   = R*R;
03797     R3   = R2*R;
03798     R4   = R3*R;
03799     R5   = R4*R;
03800     e12 *= R;
03801 
03802     // Thole damping init.
03803     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03804     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03805 
03806         rax = e12.getX();
03807         ray = e12.getY();
03808         raz = e12.getZ();
03809         rbx = - rax;
03810         rby = - ray;
03811         rbz = - raz;
03812 
03813     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03814 
03815         cxx = 1;
03816         cxy = 0;
03817         cxz = 0;
03818         cyx = 0;
03819         cyy = 1;
03820         cyz = 0;
03821         czx = 0;
03822         czy = 0;
03823         czz = 1;
03824     }
03825 
03826     double E = 0.0; // <- Electrostatic energy
03827     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03828 
03829         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_00() * pol2.Q00;
03830 
03831     if (a*u3 < 40) {
03832         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03833         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03834         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03835 
03836         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03837         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03838         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03839     }
03840     else {
03841         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03842         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03843         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03844 
03845         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03846         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03847         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03848     }
03849 
03850 
03851 
03852     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03853         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03854         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03855         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03856     }
03857 
03858     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03859         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03860         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03861         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03862     }
03863 
03864     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03865         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_00()  * pol2.Q00;
03866         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03867         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03868         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03869         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03870     }
03871 
03872     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03873         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03874         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03875         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03876         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03877         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03878     }
03879 
03880     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03881         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03882         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03883         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03884 
03885         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03886         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03887         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03888 
03889         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03890         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03891         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03892     }
03893 
03894     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03895         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03896             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03897             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03898             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03899             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03900             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03901             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03902             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03903             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03904             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03905         }
03906         else {
03907             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03908             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03909             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03910             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03911             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03912             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03913             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03914             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03915             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03916         }
03917     }
03918     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03919         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03920             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03921             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03922             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03923             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03924             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03925             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03926             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03927             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03928             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03929         }
03930         else {
03931             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03932             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03933             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03934             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03935             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03936             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03937             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03938             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03939             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03940         }
03941     }
03942 
03943     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03944         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03945         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03946         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03947 
03948         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03949         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03950         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03951 
03952         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03953         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03954         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03955 
03956         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03957         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03958         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03959 
03960         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03961         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03962         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03963     }
03964 
03965     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03966         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
03967         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
03968         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
03969 
03970         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03971         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03972         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03973 
03974         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03975         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03976         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03977 
03978         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03979         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03980         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03981 
03982         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03983         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03984         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03985     }
03986 
03987     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03988         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03989             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03990             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03991             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03992             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03993             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03994             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03995             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03996             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03997             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03998             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03999             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04000             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04001             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04002             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04003             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04004         }
04005         else {
04006             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
04007             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
04008             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
04009             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04010             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04011             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04012             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04013             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04014             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04015             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04016             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04017             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04018             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04019             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04020             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04021         }
04022     }
04023     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
04024         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
04025             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04026             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04027             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04028             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04029             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04030             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04031             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04032             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04033             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04034             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04035             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04036             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04037             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04038             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04039             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04040         }
04041         else {
04042             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04043             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04044             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04045             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04046             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04047             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04048             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04049             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04050             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04051             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04052             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04053             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04054             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04055             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04056             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04057         }
04058     }
04059 
04060     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
04061         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_20()   * pol2.Q20;
04062         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04063         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04064         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04065         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04066 
04067 
04068         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04069         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04070         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04071         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04072         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
04073         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
04074         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
04075         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
04076 
04077 
04078         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04079         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04080         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04081         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04082         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04083         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04084 
04085 
04086         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04087         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04088         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04089         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04090 
04091         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04092         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04093     }
04094 
04095     // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
04096     U *= 0.5;
04097 
04098     return E + U;
04099 }
04100 
04101 
04102 }}

04109 
04110 #endif
